activeEffect.name: Ebb
activeEffect.description: Stores one Flow Point. Damage Taken -10%.

activeEffect.name: Flow Point
activeEffect.description: Expend Flow Points to take actions. Up to 3 can be stored/used at once.

activeEffect.name: Overflow Point
activeEffect.description:
Generated every time user takes a Reserve Action.

After 3 are generated, consumes 3 Overflow Points to generate 1 Flow Point.

Flow Points in the Reserve Party may be given to the Active Party or saved until you enter the Active Party.

activeEffect.name: Brace
activeEffect.description:
Damage Taken -50%. Stamina/Focus Regen +25%.

Halves Armor Ignore.

activeEffect.name: Rest
activeEffect.description:
Triggers Health Regen. Stamina/Focus Regen +50%.

Restores 1 Purity.

activeEffect.name: Brace Shield
activeEffect.description:
Damage Taken -50%. Stamina/Focus Regen +25%.

Halves Armor Ignore.

Protects Adjacent Allies, taking Damage for them. AoE Skills do not pierce beyond user.

activeEffect.name: Brace Provoke
activeEffect.description:
Damage Taken -50%. Stamina/Focus Regen +25%.

Halves Armor Ignore.

Forces a chosen Enemy within 6 Spaces to target user.

activeEffect.name: Brace Counter
activeEffect.description:
Damage Taken -50%. Stamina/Focus Regen +25%.

Halves Armor Ignore.

Basic Counterattacks when attacked.

activeEffect.name: Rest Counter
activeEffect.description:
Triggers Health Regen. Stamina/Focus Regen +50%.

Restores 1 Purity.

Skill Counterattacks when attacked.

activeEffect.name: Rest Taunt
activeEffect.description:
Triggers Health Regen. Stamina/Focus Regen +50%.

Restores 1 Purity.

Draws Aggro from all Enemies within 4 Spaces.

activeEffect.name: Unconscious
activeEffect.description: Cannot act. At the start of the round, triggers all Regens.

activeEffect.name: Dead
activeEffect.description: Cannot act.

activeEffect.name: Broken
activeEffect.description:
Cannot act. Armor Disabled for a round.

After expiring, Break Damage Taken -25%, Armor -10% for remainder of encounter.

activeEffect.name: Break Stack
activeEffect.description: Break Damage Taken -[Stack x25]%, Armor -[Stack x10]% for remainder of encounter.

activeEffect.name: Bursted
activeEffect.description:
Disables all Damage and Status immunities/resistances. Suffer an extra Basic Attack per action used on you, regardless of action and range.

After expiring, Burst Damage Taken -25%, Power -1, and Status Slots +1 for remainder of encounter.

activeEffect.name: Burst Stack
activeEffect.description: Burst Damage Taken -[Stack x25]%, Power -[Stack], and Status Slots +[Stack] for remainder of encounter.

activeEffect.name: Blasted
activeEffect.description: Unused.

activeEffect.name: Blast Stack
activeEffect.description: Unused.

activeEffect.name: Flying
activeEffect.description:
Counts as Flying.

Immune to terrain effects.

activeEffect.name: Airborne
activeEffect.description:
Counts as Flying.

Immune to terrain effects.

activeEffect.name: Launch
activeEffect.description:
Counts as Flying.

Cannot have turn passed to, Counter, or React until Launch expires.

Launch automatically expires on your turn if there is no one else the turn can be passed to.

activeEffect.name: Health Regen
activeEffect.description: Health Regen is active.

activeEffect.name: Overdrive
activeEffect.description:
FP Generation +1, Damage Dealt +25%, Damage Taken -25%.

Cost/2, Movement x1.25.

At the end of the round, suffer -1d3 Drive. Return to normal at 0. Die sides increase by 1 for every 5 Maximum Drive.

activeEffect.name: Antidrive
activeEffect.description:
FP Generation =1d3, Damage Dealt +75%, Damage Taken +25%.

Cost = 0.

Instead of targeting normally, targets based on 1d6. [1-2: Ally, 3-4: Enemy, 5: Self, 6: Brace.]

At the end of the round, suffer -1d3 Drive. Return to normal at 0. Die sides increase by 1 for every 5 Maximum Drive.

activeEffect.name: Burn
activeEffect.description:
Deals 3 Fire Damage/round and disables Shield Health.

Lasts 3 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Blaze
activeEffect.description:
Deals 6 Fire Damage/round and disables Shield Health.

Lasts 3 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Incinerate
activeEffect.description:
Deals 9 Fire Damage/round and disables Shield Health.

Lasts 3 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Inferno
activeEffect.description:
Deals 12 Fire Damage/round and disables Shield Health.

Lasts 3 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Sublimate
activeEffect.description:
Deals 15 Fire Damage/round and disables Shield Health.

Lasts 3 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Frostbite
activeEffect.description:
Deals 2 Ice Damage/round, lowers Move by 3 and Speed by 2. (Min of 1.)

Lasts 3 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Bitterfrost
activeEffect.description:
Deals 4 Ice Damage/round, lowers Move by 5 and Speed by 2. (Min of 1.)

Lasts 3 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Permafrost
activeEffect.description:
Deals 6 Ice Damage/round, lowers Move by 7 and Speed by 3. (Min of 1.)

Lasts 4 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Everfrost
activeEffect.description:
Deals 9 Ice Damage/round, lowers Move by 9 and Speed by 4. (Min of 1.)

Lasts 4 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Deposition
activeEffect.description:
Deals 12 Ice Damage/round, sets Move and Speed to 1.

Lasts 4 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Chilled
activeEffect.description:
Increases Fire/Ice Damage Taken by 10% for 3 rounds.

Prevents actions for 1 round. Can also be cured with any Fire skill.

Does not increase Fire/Ice Damage Taken by Status Effects.

activeEffect.name: Frozen
activeEffect.description:
Increases Fire/Ice Damage Taken by 20% for 3 rounds.

Prevents actions for 1 round. Can also be cured with any Fire skill.

Does not increase Fire/Ice Damage Taken by Status Effects.

activeEffect.name: Hypothermic
activeEffect.description:
Deals 10 Ice Damage/round and increases Fire/Ice Damage Taken by 30% for 3 rounds.

Prevents actions for 1 round. Can also be cured with any Fire skill.

Does not increase Fire/Ice Damage Taken by Status Effects.

activeEffect.name: Crystalized
activeEffect.description:
Deals 12 Ice Damage/round and increases Fire/Ice Damage Taken by 40% for 3 rounds.

Prevents actions for 1 round. Can also be cured with any Tier 2+ Fire skill.

Does not increase Fire/Ice Damage Taken by Status Effects.

activeEffect.name: Fossilized
activeEffect.description:
Deals 15 Ice Damage/round and increases Fire/Ice Damage Taken by 50% for 3 rounds.

Prevents actions for 1 round. Can also be cured with any Tier 2+ Fire skill.

Does not increase Fire/Ice Damage Taken by Status Effects.

activeEffect.name: Static
activeEffect.description:
Before attack, self and allies within 2 spaces take 3 Thunder Damage.

Lasts 3 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Conductive
activeEffect.description:
Before attack, self and allies within 3 spaces take 5 Thunder Damage.

Lasts 3 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Electrocuted
activeEffect.description:
Before attack, self and allies within 4 spaces take 7 Thunder Damage.

Lasts 3 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Discharged
activeEffect.description:
Before attack, self and allies within 5 spaces take 10 Thunder Damage.

Lasts 3 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Overloaded
activeEffect.description:
Before attack, self and allies within 5 spaces take 12 Thunder Damage.

Lasts 4 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Frail
activeEffect.description:
Toughness -1. All attacks suffer 25% Recoil Air Damage.

Lasts 2 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Deficient
activeEffect.description:
Toughness -1. All attacks suffer 50% Recoil Air Damage.

Lasts 2 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Hollow
activeEffect.description:
Toughness -2. All attacks suffer 75% Recoil Air Damage.

Lasts 2 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Deterioration
activeEffect.description:
Toughness -2. All attacks suffer 100% Recoil Air Damage.

Lasts 2 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Distintegration
activeEffect.description:
Toughness -3. All attacks suffer 150% Recoil Air Damage.

Lasts 2 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Poison
activeEffect.description:
Deals 20% of current Health (Max 10 against enemies) in Ground Damage per round.

Will always leave at least 1 Health.

Quartered and flat against bosses.

Lasts 3 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Toxic
activeEffect.description:
Power -1. Deals 20% of current Health (Max 10 against enemies) in Ground Damage per round.

Will always leave at least 1 Health.

Quartered and flat against bosses.

Lasts 3 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Venom
activeEffect.description:
Power -2. Deals 20% of current Health (Max 15 against enemies) in Ground Damage per round.

Will always leave at least 1 Health.

Quartered and flat against bosses.

Lasts 3 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Hypertoxin
activeEffect.description:
Power -4. Deals 20% of current Health (Max 15 against enemies) in Ground Damage per round.

Will always leave at least 1 Health.

Quartered and flat against bosses.

Lasts 3 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Hypervenom
activeEffect.description:
Power -6. Deals 25% of current Health (Max 20 against enemies) in Ground Damage per round.

Will always leave at least 1 Health.

Quartered and flat against bosses.

Lasts 4 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Acid
activeEffect.description:
Deals 10% of Max Health in Ground Damage per round, increasing by 5% each round.

Will always leave at least 1 Health.

Halved and flat against bosses.

Lasts 3 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Corrosion
activeEffect.description:
Power -1. Deals 10% of Max Health in Ground Damage per round, increasing by 10% each round.

Will always leave at least 1 Health.

Halved and flat against bosses.

Lasts 3 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Erosion
activeEffect.description:
Power -2. Deals 10% of Max Health in Ground Damage per round, increasing by 10% each round.

Will always leave at least 1 Health.

Halved and flat against bosses.

Lasts 3 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Dissolve
activeEffect.description:
Power -4. Deals 10% of Max Health in Ground Damage per round, increasing by 10% each round.

Will always leave at least 1 Health.

Halved and flat against bosses.

Lasts 3 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Atomize
activeEffect.description:
Power -6. Deals 10% of Max Health in Ground Damage per round, increasing by 10% each round.

Will always leave at least 1 Health.

Halved and flat against bosses.

Lasts 4 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Charmed
activeEffect.description:
33% chance of using skill on ally instead of target, or reverse for recovery skills.

Lasts 3 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Captivated
activeEffect.description:
50% chance of using skill on ally instead of target, or reverse for recovery skills.

Lasts 2 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Enchanted
activeEffect.description:
GM takes round instead of player.

Lasts 1 round.

activeEffect.name: Dominated
activeEffect.description:
GM takes round instead of player.

Damage Dealt +50% against Allies/other Players.

Lasts 1 round.

activeEffect.name: Brainwashed
activeEffect.description:
GM takes round instead of player.

Damage Dealt +100% against Allies/other Players.

Lasts 2 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Bleed
activeEffect.description:
Prevents healing and deals the higher of Health/10 and Health Regen/2 Damage/round.

On enemies, prevents healing and drains Health at a fixed rate.

Lasts 2 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Hemorrhage
activeEffect.description:
Prevents healing and deals the higher of [2 + Health/10] and [2 + Health Regen/2] Damage/round.

On enemies, prevents healing and drains Health at a fixed rate +2.

Adds Bleed Damage/4 to all Damage Taken from attacks.

Lasts 2 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Drain
activeEffect.description:
Inverts Stamina/Focus regen rates. If either falls to 0, drains Health instead of that resource.

On enemies, drains Health at a different rate than Bleed instead.

Lasts 2 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Depletion
activeEffect.description:
Multiplies Stamina/Focus regen rates by 1.5x, then inverts them. If either falls to 0, drains Health instead of that resource.

On enemies, drains Health at a different rate +2 than Bleed instead.

Adds Drain Damage/3 to all Damage Taken from attacks.

Lasts 2 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Dazed
activeEffect.description: Unused.

activeEffect.name: Staggered
activeEffect.description: Unused.

activeEffect.name: Crash
activeEffect.description:
Prevents Drive generation.

On enemies, deals 10% of Max Break Damage and Burst Damage per round.

Lasts 2 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Muted
activeEffect.description:
Nullifies effects of Support Skills.

Deals 2 Damage/round for every effect nullified on application, and any others applied over Muted duration.

Lasts 2 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Rupture
activeEffect.description:
Applied as stacks.

Increases Break Damage/Burst Damage Taken by 3.

[Players, DP] Decreases Drive Gain/increases Purity Loss by 1.

Lasts 2 rounds.

[Players] Decreases Stamina/Focus Regen by 1.

Lasts 1 round.

activeEffect.name: Weakened
activeEffect.description: Prevents dealing Elemental and Effective Damage for 2 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Panic
activeEffect.description:
Targets nearest ally within Basic Attack range before taking action. (Does not Move user.)

Increases Speed by 3.

Cannot Ebb, Brace, Rest, or Heavy Attack.

Lasts 2 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Ensnare
activeEffect.description:
Disables Movement from Skills/Weapon Skills.

Lasts 2 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Dizzy
activeEffect.description:
Prevents usage of Skills/Attacks beyond point blank.

Lasts 2 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Binds
activeEffect.description:
Applied as stacks. Lowers Move by 2 per stack.

At 5 Stacks, applies Ensnare.

Stack decrements on Damage Taken and 1 stack per round.

Not transferred by Infection.

activeEffect.name: Stun
activeEffect.description: Cannot act this round.

activeEffect.name: Negative
activeEffect.description:
Switches party alignment.

Allies become enemies, enemies become allies.

Lasts 2 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Blind
activeEffect.description:
Attacks have a 40% chance to graze, suffering Damage Dealt -50%.

Lasts 2 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Infection
activeEffect.description:
Anyone who melee attacks/gets melee attacked by infectee, passes an adjacent tile/has their adjacent tile passed by infectee receives all Statuses, Buffs, and Debuffs currently on them, including Infection.

Infection cannot be given to the same person twice.

Does not take a Status Slot.

Lasts 2 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Basic Counter
activeEffect.description: Retaliates against all attacks with a basic attack.

activeEffect.name: Skill Counter
activeEffect.description: Retaliates against all attacks with a skill attack.

activeEffect.name: Provoke
activeEffect.description:
Forces target to attack user and disables Reactive Attacks against other targets.

Must take shortest path, and must move as close as possible.

On Players, deals Bleed Damage and applies Panic if they refuse to attack target.

May fail against certain targets.

Lasts 1 round.

activeEffect.name: Aggro
activeEffect.description:
Forces target to attack user, unless another ally targets aggroed enemy.

Must take shortest path, and must move as close as possible.

On Players, deals half Bleed Damage and applies Panic if they refuse to attack target.

If applied to a target that already has Aggro towards the attacker, converts Aggro into Provoke.

May fail against certain targets.

Lasts 1 round.

activeEffect.name: Deter
activeEffect.description:
Forces target to not attack user, unless user targets aggroed enemy.

On Players, deals Drain Damage and applies Muted if they attack target.

May fail against certain targets.

Lasts 1 round.

activeEffect.name: Challenge
activeEffect.description:
Forces user and target to only target each other.

If an outsider attempts to intervene, triggers a Death Roll on them.

Can be refused.

activeEffect.name: Overheat
activeEffect.description:
Disables Body Parts and Regen.

Cannot switch out.

Lasts 2 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Stopped
activeEffect.description: Automatically applied when inflicted with Chilled, its' higher tier forms, and Stun.

activeEffect.name: Sleep
activeEffect.description:
FP -1, enables Health Regen.

All Regens +50%, and restores Purity at a rate of 25%/round.

33% chance to wake up and suffer Damage Taken +100% on attack.

100% chance and Damage Taken +75% on Effective Damage Taken.

33% chance to wake up each round, should Sleeping target want to. Increases by 33% each round.

Lasts 3 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Link
activeEffect.description:
Stuck adjacent to other targets with Link.

When moving, all adjacent Linked targets move together.

Move -[Number of Linked targets x2].

activeEffect.name: Vanish
activeEffect.description:
Cannot be the Main Target of attacks.

When taking an action, moving adjacent to opponents, or being moved adjacent to by opponents, break Vanish.

activeEffect.name: Charged
activeEffect.description: Cost +50%, Damage Dealt +25%.

activeEffect.name: Data Fragmentation
activeEffect.description:
Damage Dealt +50%.

Increases by 10% each round.

activeEffect.name: Buff
activeEffect.description: Generic Buff.

activeEffect.name: Buff (1)
activeEffect.description: Generic Buff. (1)

activeEffect.name: Buff (2)
activeEffect.description: Generic Buff. (2)

activeEffect.name: Buff (3)
activeEffect.description: Generic Buff. (3)

activeEffect.description: Generic Stance. (1)

activeEffect.name: Stance (2)
activeEffect.description: Generic Stance. (2)

activeEffect.name: Stance (3)
activeEffect.description: Generic Stance. (3)

activeEffect.description: Generic Stack.

activeEffect.description: Generic Positive Stack.

activeEffect.description: Generic Negative Stack.

activeEffect.description: Power Up.

activeEffect.name: Power Down
activeEffect.description: Power Down.

activeEffect.description: Basic Power Up.

activeEffect.description: Next Power Up.

activeEffect.description: Armor Up.

activeEffect.description: Armor Negation.

activeEffect.description: Standard Armor Up.

activeEffect.name: Standard Armor Down

activeEffect.description: Abnormal Armor Up.

activeEffect.description: Next Armor Up.

activeEffect.name: Next Armor Down
activeEffect.description: Next Armor Down.

activeEffect.description: Next Standard Armor Up.

activeEffect.name: Next Standard Armor Down
activeEffect.description: Next Standard Armor Down.

activeEffect.description: Next Prismatic Armor Up.

activeEffect.name: Next Prismatic Armor Down
activeEffect.description: Next Prismatic Armor Down.

activeEffect.description: Next Abnormal Armor Up.

activeEffect.name: Next Abnormal Armor Down
activeEffect.description: Next Abnormal Armor Down.

activeEffect.name: Speed Up
activeEffect.description: Speed Up.

activeEffect.name: Speed Down
activeEffect.description: Speed Down.

activeEffect.name: Move Up
activeEffect.description: Move Up.

activeEffect.name: Move Down
activeEffect.description: Move Down.

activeEffect.name: Counter Seal
activeEffect.description: Counter Seal.

activeEffect.name: Reactive Seal
activeEffect.description: Reactive Seal.

activeEffect.name: Restock
activeEffect.description: Restock.

activeEffect.name: Empowered Shield
activeEffect.description: Empowered Shield.

activeEffect.name: Frost Burn
activeEffect.description:
Deals 4 IceFire Damage/round, disables Shield Health, lowers Move by 2, and Speed by 1. (Min of 1.)

If resistant to only one, applies Neutrally.

If weak to at least one, applies Effectively.

Lasts 3 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Freeze Blaze
activeEffect.description:
Deals 6 IceFire Damage/round, disables Shield Health, lowers Move by 3, and Speed by 2. (Min of 1.)

If resistant to only one, applies Neutrally.

If weak to at least one, applies Effectively.

Lasts 3 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Frost Burn Tier 3
activeEffect.description: Unused.

activeEffect.name: Frost Burn Tier 4
activeEffect.description: Unused.

activeEffect.name: Frost Burn Tier 5
activeEffect.description: Unused.

activeEffect.name: Acid Burn
activeEffect.description:
Deals 5% of Max Health in GroundFire Damage/round, increasing by 2.5% each round.

Disables Shield Health.

Flat against bosses, not halved. (Max 15/round against bosses.)

If resistant to only one, applies Neutrally.

If weak to at least one, applies Effectively.

Lasts 4 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Corrosive Blaze
activeEffect.description:
Power -1. Deals 5% of Max Health in GroundFire Damage/round, increasing by 3% each round.

Disables Shield Health.

Flat against bosses, not halved. (Max 25/round against bosses.)

If resistant to only one, applies Neutrally.

If weak to at least one, applies Effectively.

Lasts 4 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Acid Burn Tier 3
activeEffect.description: Unused.

activeEffect.name: Acid Burn Tier 4
activeEffect.description: Unused.

activeEffect.name: Acid Burn Tier 5
activeEffect.description: Unused.

activeEffect.name: Holy Burn
activeEffect.description:
Deals 4 Holy Damage/round, prevents dealing Effective Damage, and prevents Healing.

Lasts 2 rounds.

activeEffect.name: Quick Burn
activeEffect.description:
When triggering a Burn Status, trigger it twice.

Second trigger always decrements duration, even if first one does not. (Max 3 additional activations/round.)

Does not take a Status Slot.

Expires when Burn Status does.

activeEffect.name: Overstatic
activeEffect.description:
Increases Static Status Damage by the number of times target has been hit this round, then halves this additional value next round.

Does not take a Status Slot.

Expires when Static Status does.

activeEffect.name: Black Frail
activeEffect.description:
All hits of attacks suffer 5 Recoil Abnormal Damage.

Lasts 2 rounds.

If affected has a higher tier Frail Status, modifies Frail Status to trigger on "All hits of attacks" instead, does not take a Status Slot and expires when Frail Status does.

activeEffect.name: Gray Frail
activeEffect.description:
All attacks suffer 3 Recoil Abnormal Damage.

Prevents using any Unsupport Skills for duration.

Lasts 2 rounds.

If affected has a higher tier Frail Status, adds "Prevents using any Unsupport Skills for duration" to Frail Status instead, does not take a Status Slot and expires when Frail Status does.

activeEffect.name: White Frail
activeEffect.description:
Power +3. All attacks suffer 33% Recoil Abnormal Damage.

Prevents using any Support Skills for duration.

Lasts 2 rounds.

If affected has a higher tier Frail Status, adds "Prevents using any Support Skills for duration" to Frail Status instead, does not take a Status Slot and expires when Frail Status does.
